data.title: Bill Nunn III Legacy Fund â€“ POISE Foundation
data.text:
This fund was established in 2016 by the family and friends of Bill Nunn, III. The purpose of the fund is to primarily support the Bill Nunn Theatre Outreach Project which has a mission to create a platform for underserved public school students in the Pittsburgh region to gain access to theatre arts and work with seasoned professionals within the field.

Click the link below to learn more about this fund and to make a donation.
